messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

for calls for calls hello could you please log ticket assign appropriate for investigation please be advised provides for employees thank you kind regards specialist en ext sent friday for calls hello currently able call out external via above application phone rings other end but when answer hear anything hear anything either once picked up please could someone look into for br infrastructure consultant infrastructure
